scripts.mainnet: graph-compiler --config config/mainnet.json --include node_modules/@openzeppelin/subgraphs/src/datasources --export-schema --export-subgraph && graph codegen generated/mainnetsubgraph.yaml && graph build generated/mainnetsubgraph.yaml && graph deploy --studio mainnet-erc20-erc721-erc1155 generated/mainnetsubgraph.yaml
